metadata.title: Wolfram Alpha Validation Queries for Gates G25-G30
metadata.description: Simple numerical validation queries for Principia Metaphysica gates G25-G30
metadata.notes: Queries designed for Wolfram Alpha API compatibility

gates.name: Asymptotic Freedom
gates.description: QCD running coupling: alpha_s decreases at high energy (asymptotic freedom). Beta function b3 = -7 ensures coupling vanishes at infinite energy.
gates.notes: At Planck scale E = 10^19 GeV, alpha_s^(-1) becomes very large, so alpha_s -> 0. Query computes alpha_3^(-1) at E ~ M_Planck.

gates.name: Asymptotic Freedom (alternative)
gates.description: Strong coupling at M_Z from GUT scale running with beta coefficient b3 = -7

gates.name: Electron Mass-to-Charge
gates.description: Electron mass-to-charge ratio derived from fundamental constants. Uses SI values.
gates.notes: m_e/e = 5.686 x 10^-12 kg/C. This ratio is locked geometrically in PM framework.

gates.name: Electron Mass-to-Charge (alpha relation)
gates.description: Fine structure constant computed from fundamental constants, demonstrating geometric lock of electron properties
gates.notes: Fine structure constant alpha = 1/137.036 = 0.007297, relates mass and charge geometrically

gates.name: PMNS Matrix Lock - theta_12
gates.description: Solar mixing angle from tribimaximal pattern with small correction
gates.notes: Base tribimaximal angle = 35.26 deg. Experimental value = 33.41 deg after correction.

gates.name: PMNS Matrix Lock - theta_23
gates.description: Atmospheric mixing angle from maximal mixing plus golden angle correction
gates.notes: theta_23 = 45 + golden_angle/2 ~ 49.75 deg. NuFIT 6.0 IO value = 49.3 deg.

gates.name: PMNS Matrix Lock - theta_13
gates.description: Reactor mixing angle from cycle intersection topology
gates.notes: theta_13 ~ sqrt(12*3)/24 with 4% correction ~ 8.54 deg. NuFIT 6.0 = 8.54 deg.

gates.name: Lepton Number Conservation
gates.description: Every lepton has anti-node in hidden 163 sector. Total: 125 + 163 = 288
gates.notes: Active (125) + Hidden (163) = Total roots (288). Lepton number conserved by partition symmetry.

gates.name: Lepton Number Conservation (partition ratio)
gates.description: Ratio of hidden to active manifold nodes

gates.name: Weak Hypercharge
gates.description: U(1) hypercharge from shadow handedness. Left-handed interact with W bosons.
gates.notes: Shadow ratio 12/24 = 0.5 gives hypercharge assignments for left-handed leptons (Y = -1/2)

gates.name: Weak Hypercharge (sin^2 theta_W)
gates.description: Weak mixing angle at GUT scale from SU(5) prediction
gates.notes: GUT prediction sin^2(theta_W) = 3/8 = 0.375. Runs to 0.2312 at M_Z.

gates.name: Weak Hypercharge (experimental)
gates.description: Weak mixing angle after RG running from GUT to electroweak scale

gates.name: Leptonic Hierarchical Gap - mu/e
gates.description: Muon-to-electron mass ratio (higher harmonic of electron)

summary.notes: All queries use simple arithmetic or trigonometric functions that Wolfram Alpha can parse. Physical constants use CODATA 2022 / PDG 2024 values where applicable.
